description: List service type unit of measures.
permissions: Any user, including anonymous users, can list service type unit of measures; the policy scope resolves all records for anonymous and non-admin users.
validation_notes: The quantifiable filter must be a boolean value (true/false).

flags.name: --unit-of-measure
flags.description: Filter by unit of measure ID.

flags.name: --quantifiable
flags.validation: Must be a boolean value: true or false (examples: true, false).
